mosinstall.name: TinyMCE
mosinstall.author: Moxiecode Systems AB
mosinstall.description: TinyMCE is a platform independent web based Javascript HTML WYSIWYG editor control.

param.name: theme
param.label: Functionality
param.description: Select functionality

param.name: cleanup
param.label: Code Cleanup
param.description: By default TinyMCE will clean your code of certain html elements, like script and center tags, for security and XHTML compliance. We recommend you do no deactivate this funcitonality

param.name: autosave
param.label: Save Warning
param.description: Save warning - gives warning if you cancel without saving changes

param.name: compressed
param.label: Compressed Version
param.description: Tiny can be run in compressed mode, leading to slightly faster load speeds. However, this mode does not always work, especially in IE, so default this is off. Be careful when enabling this to ensure it works on your system

param.name: text_direction
param.label: Text Direction
param.description: Ability to change text direction

param.name: relative_urls
param.label: Urls
param.description: URL behaviour

param.name: invalid_elements
param.label: Prohibited Elements
param.description: Elements that will be cleaned from the text

param.name: content_css
param.label: Template CSS classes
param.description: By default the bot looks for an editor_content.css file. If it cant find one it loads template_css.css. However if you want to force loading of template_css.css than please select `yes`

param.name: content_css_custom
param.label: Custom CSS Classes
param.description: You can specify the loading of a custom CSS file - simply enter the FULL URl path to the css file you want loaded. If you enter a value in this field, this will overrule the `Template CSS classes` parameter

param.name: newlines
param.label: Newlines
param.description: Newlines will be made into the selected option

param.name: toolbar
param.label: Toolbar
param.description: Position of the toolbar

param.name: smilies
param.label: Smilies
param.description: Show/Hide the Smilies buttons. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: table
param.label: Table
param.description: Show/Hide the Table control buttons. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: flash
param.label: Flash
param.description: Show/Hide the Flash button. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: media
param.label: Media
param.description: Show/Hide the Media button. Allows embedding embedded media such as QuickTime, Flash, ShockWave, RealPlayer and Windows Media Player. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: hr
param.label: Horizontal Rule
param.description: Show/Hide the Horizontal Rule button

param.name: style
param.label: Style
param.description: Show/Hide the CSS Style control button. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: layer
param.label: Layer
param.description: Show/Hide the Layer control button. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: visualchars
param.label: View Inivisible Chars
param.description: Show/Hide the View Inivisible Chars button. Allow possibility to see invisible characters like nonbreaking spaces. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: nonbreaking
param.label: Nonbreaking Space
param.description: Show/Hide the Nonbreaking space button. Insert nonbreaking space entities at the current carent location. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: fullscreen
param.label: Fullscreen
param.description: Show/Hide the Fullscreen button. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: html_height
param.label: HTML Height
param.description: Height of HTML mode pop-up window. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: html_width
param.label: HTML Width
param.description: Width of HTML mode pop-up window. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: preview
param.label: Preview
param.description: Show/Hide the Preview buttons. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: preview_height
param.label: Preview Height
param.description: Height of Preview mode pop-up window. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: preview_width
param.label: Preview Width
param.description: Width of Preview mode pop-up window. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: searchreplace
param.label: Search & Replace
param.description: Show/Hide the Search & Replace button. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: insertdate
param.label: Insert Date
param.description: Show/Hide the Insert Date button. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: format_date
param.label: Date format
param.description: Format of inserted Date. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: inserttime
param.label: Insert Time
param.description: Show/Hide the Insert Time button. Only works in `Advanced` mode

param.name: format_time
param.label: Time format
param.description: Format of inserted Time. Only works in `Advanced` mode
